basic_info.description1: I’m Ogulcan Kahraman, a Computer Engineering graduate from Ege University. With my passion for technology and analytical mindset, I’ve developed myself in various areas. I’ve had the opportunity to work with numerous technologies such as React, Java, Python, Flutter, and SQL, which I actively use in my projects.
basic_info.description2: Throughout my career, I’ve gained experience in fields like mobile game development, software engineering, and automation solutions. During my time at Yapı Kredi Technology, I completed projects using CRM systems and UiPath, optimized processes, and gained significant experience in team management. Currently, as the founding developer at Znr Tech, I focus on creating corporate identities and developing automation solutions that enhance business processes. Working within a small team, I take an active role at every stage, building technical infrastructure and delivering tailored solutions to meet client needs. My goal is to consistently produce innovative projects and stay ahead of the curve.

projects.title: MASOMO
projects.subtitle: Game Designer
projects.description:
Contributed to all stages of mobile game development, from design to maintenance, gaining comprehensive experience across departments.
Managed projects to completion on time and within budget while maintaining high-quality standards.
Enhanced user experience through regular updates and optimizations during the maintenance phase.
Delivered innovative solutions by staying updated on industry trends and technologies.
Fostered collaboration and smooth coordination across teams, ensuring successful project outcomes.

projects.title: FenoTech
projects.subtitle: Game Developer
projects.description:
Successfully published a mobile game using Flutter while leading a small team and managing operations.
Promoted collaboration and innovation by enabling team members to create their own games within the same framework.
Ensured smooth execution through clear communication, implemented best practices, and enhanced project quality and performance.
Fostered a positive and creative team environment by encouraging new ideas and solutions.
Guided the team through challenges, ensuring timely delivery of successful and unique game projects.

projects.title: YapıKredi Technology
projects.subtitle: Software Engineer
projects.description:
Gained long-term experience working on CRM systems and contributed to all phases of software development, from requirements gathering to maintenance.
Collaborated with business units to deliver technical solutions and participated in major projects recognized as key company initiatives.
Utilized diverse technologies, including Java, React, SQL, Spring Boot, and Angular, while adapting to various frameworks as needed.
Ensured high-quality development by following best practices and fostering teamwork within a large-scale company environment.
Contributed to software improvement by enhancing functionality, performance, and overall project outcomes.

projects.title: YapıKredi Technology
projects.subtitle: Automation Engineer
projects.description:
Developed automation solutions using UiPath and managed end-to-end project processes, from initiation to deployment.
Completed numerous projects, took on leadership responsibilities, and ensured successful outcomes despite a smaller team size.
Enhanced communication and people management skills by coordinating with team members and handling project handovers effectively.
Gained expertise in crisis management by resolving challenges quickly and maintaining project continuity.
These experiences strengthened my skills in project management, automation, communication, and team leadership.

projects.title: Znr Tech
projects.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
projects.description:
I have been serving as the Lead Developer at this newly established startup since its inception.
As a company, we provide services focused on creating corporate identities for brands and developing automation solutions for businesses.
My primary focus is on automation engineering, where I develop innovative applications to streamline business processes.
Due to our small team structure, I also take on the role of a Full Stack Developer when needed, supporting all stages of projects.
I am responsible for building the company’s technical infrastructure, optimizing processes, and delivering tailored solutions to meet client needs.

projects.title: Free Lance
projects.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
projects.description:
As a freelance developer, I specialize in delivering end-to-end software solutions tailored to client needs.
My expertise spans a wide range of technologies, including Java, React, Flutter, SQL, and UiPath.
I have successfully collaborated with diverse clients to develop mobile applications, web platforms, and automation tools that optimize business processes.
With a focus on quality, efficiency, and innovation, I take pride in managing projects from concept to completion, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.
I am committed to helping businesses achieve their goals.
